subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: England stayed in contention for a spot in the 2008 European Championship by beating Israel, 3-0, yesterday in a qualifying match at Wembley Stadium.Shaun Wright-Phillips, Michael Owen and Micah Richards each scored for England, which had been in fourth place in Group E before the match.Wright-Phillips scored his first competitive international goal in the 20th minute. Owen made it 2-0 in the 49th minute, swiveling on the edge of the penalty box and scoring with a half volley.Richards, a defender, scored his first international goal in the 66th minute.
